FuncDef: This command configures a destination TCP or UDP port number or port range for an IP LI filter match criterion. Note that an entry containing Layer 4 match criteria will not match non-initial (second, third, and so on) fragments of a fragmented packet since only the first fragment contains the Layer 4 information.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the operator to use relative to dst-port-number for specifying the port number match criteria.
Specifies an inclusive range of port numbers to be used as a match criteria. The destination port numbers start-port and end-port are expressed as decimal integers. Values-[0..65535]D.
